compatibility.notes: As a public domain license, the JPL-image license allows for maximum compatibility with other licenses, but care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Credit the source when using images.
Do not use NASA logos without permission.
Ensure no endorsement is implied when using images.
license.name: JPL-image
obligations: Obtain prior written approval for using NASA insignia, logos, or seals.
Do not claim or imply endorsement by NASA, JPL, or Caltech.
Obtain permission for commercial use of images featuring identifiable persons.
Contact Institutional Communications Office for advertising or public relations use.
